sys_ui_script.name: x_433469_travel_tr.CalculationHelpers

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_2a0a8f80db56001088f88a1848961947
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>x_433469_travel_tr.CalculationHelpers</name><script><![CDATA[var x_433469_travel_tr = x_433469_travel_tr || {};

x_433469_travel_tr.CalculationHelpers = (function() {
    "use strict";

    function calculateTotalCost() {
        //TODO get mileageRate app property
        var mileageRate = '0.58';
        var mileageCost = g_form.getDecimalValue('total_miles') * mileageRate;
        g_form.setValue('mileage', mileageCost);
        var totalCost = g_form.getDecimalValue('registration') + g_form.getDecimalValue('airfare') + g_form.getDecimalValue('hotel_per_diem') + g_form.getDecimalValue('meals_per_diem') + mileageCost + g_form.getDecimalValue('rental_car') + g_form.getDecimalValue('tolls') + g_form.getDecimalValue('shuttle_taxi') + g_form.getDecimalValue('parking');

        g_form.setValue('total_estimated_cost', totalCost);
    }


    return {
        calculateTotalCost: calculateTotalCost,
        type: "CalculationHelpers"
    };
})();]]></script><script_name>CalculationHelpers</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 22:08:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a0a8f80db56001088f88a1848961947</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_433469_travel_tr.CalculationHelpers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Travel Training Approval" source="x_433469_travel_tr">77360133db82001088f88a184896192a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Travel Training Approval">77360133db82001088f88a184896192a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_2a0a8f80db56001088f88a1848961947</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-07 22:57:42</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>true</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
